tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpactAssessment (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    construction_area DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    construction_type VARCHAR(50),
    impact_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessment (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_report (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    findings TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES environmental_impact_assessment(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE construction_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE impact_assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    assessor_name VARCHAR(100),
    assessment_date DATE,
    impact_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE assessment_details (
    detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    detail_description VARCHAR(255),
    detail_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  responsible_consultant_id INT,
  report_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE project_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
);

CREATE TABLE construction_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    factor_name VARCHAR(255),
    impact_score INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES construction_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    team_lead VARCHAR(255),
    team_member VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES construction_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    impact_id INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_result VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES construction_projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES impact_categories(category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (impact_id) REFERENCES environmental_impact(impact_id)
);
